Invocation Name: aum mantra
des: Features OM Mantra Meditation recorded at 528Hz - also known as the miracle tone of transformation. The vibrations from OM mantra help in aligning chakras, calming mind and body and reduce stress. Combining this powerful mantra with a powerful 528Hz frequency amplifies the effects of the chants and vibrations.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
